alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:43PM CDT until August 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHERN PERKINS...EASTERN CHASE AND WESTERN HAYES COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT/643 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Elsie to 12 miles northeast of Enders to near Wauneta to 11 miles southwest of Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Hamlet, Center Dam Campground, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
